data.title: Set up your wallet
data.text: Connect your wallet to one the supported Networks and get started.

data.title: Create your collection
data.text: Click Create and set up your raffles collections & NFT Collections(Soon).

data.title: Add your NFTs and List them for a cause
data.text: Creating the raffle and letting the users to buy tickets.

data.title: Pick a winner & leave with a incentive
data.text: Pick a winner for your raffle and get an incentive for listing your NFT with originX
